Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Isa la'i ki kuraisa adi ho ga'e
Saradi ate garami de safara de
Tam unham nu cahida hai ki uha isa ghara de raba di sadagi karana
Jisa ne unham nu kukhi'am nu bhojana dita ate bhai'a tom unham nu amana dita
